about_the_game:
Run, climb and fly through a twisted and wonderous world.

Journey across a surreal world where echoes of your ancestors guide you towards your wings. The game’s unique movement mechanics bring to life every treacherous slope and slippery gorge. Procedural animation brings the dragon to life like never before.

Reminiscent of the introspective journeys found in classics like Shadow of the Colossus and Journey, Explore and traverse vast, haunting environments, uncovering forgotten secrets and eventually gaining your wings.

You must reach the cloister at the heart of each dragon temple. Following the same journey taken by your forebearers.

Feel the weight and momentum of a young dragon as you navigate treacherous landscapes. From climbing steep cliffs to scrambling up shifting sands, every movement is a challenge to master. The game’s dynamic terrain physics combined with procedural animation makes every step a test of skill. With time, you’ll learn to glide across the air and dive from great heights, preparing yourself for the ultimate goal—flight.

Explore a beautifully desolate world where the ruins of the ancients lie hidden. Each region offers a unique environmental challenge, from dense forest to vast deserts and towering mountain ranges. Solve puzzles, uncover ancient relics, and listen to the whispers of long-forgotten ancestors who will guide you on your path.

Experience the fluidity of movement with a unique procedural animation system. Every motion, from the dragon’s cautious steps to its powerful leaps, is generated in real-time, adapting to the terrain and player input. Whether scaling steep cliffs, gliding through the air, or slithering across slippery surfaces.

name: A Dragons Dawn

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-3770 / AMD FX-9590 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM MB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050 / AMD 500 Series or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4790K / AMD Ryzen 5 2600 or better
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 3060 / RX 570 Series or better
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD recommended

short_description: You are but a hatchling. Journey across a surreal world where echoes of your ancestors guide you towards your wings. The game’s unique movement mechanics bring to life every treacherous slope and slippery gorge. Procedural animation brings the dragon to life like never before!
